Name: Acrobatic
Short Text: +2 Bonus on Jump and Tumble checks
Long Text: You get a +2 bonus on all Jump checks and Tumble checks.

Name: Agile
Short Text: +2 bonus on Balance and Escape Artist check
Long Text: You get a +2 bonus on all Balance checks and Escape Artist checks.

Name: Alertness
Short Text: +2 bonus on Listen and Spot checks
Long Text: You get a +2 bonus on all Listen checks and Spot checks.

Name: Animal Affinity
Short Text: +2 bonus on Handle Animal and Ride checks
Long Text: You get a +2 bonus on all Handle Animel checks and Ride checks.

Name: Armor Proficiency (Heavy)
Short Text: No armor check penalty on attack rolls
Long Text: You are proficient with heavy armor and shields.

Name: Armor Proficiency (Medium)
Short Text: No armor check penalty on attack rolls
Long Text: You are proficient with medium armor.

Name: Armor proficiency (Light)
Short Text: No armor check penalty on attack rolls
Long Text: You are proficient with light armor.

Name: Athletic
Short Text: +2 bonus on all Climb and Swim checks.
Long Text: You get a +2 bonus on all Climb checks and Swim checks.

Name: Augment Summoning

Misc: Summoned creatures get +4 strength and +4 constitution

Short Text: Summoned creatures get +4 str, +4 con
Long Text: Each creature you conjure with any summon spell gains a +4 enchancement bonus to strength and Constitution for the duration of the spell that summoned it

Name: Blind-Fight

Misc: Reroll miss chance when fighting against an opponent with concealment
invisible attackers do not get bonuses to hit for being invisible
You do not lose your dexterity bonus against invisible attackers
Take only half penalties to movement speed for being unable to see

Short Text: Reroll miss chance for concealment
Long Text: In melee, every time you miss because of concealment, you can reroll your miss chance percentile roll one time to see if you actually hit.  An invisible attacker gets no advantages related to hitting you in melee.  That is, you don't lose your Dexterity bonus to Armor class, and the attacker doesn;t get the usual +2 bonus for being invisible.  The invisible attacker's bonuses do still apply for ranged attacks, however.  You take only half the usual penalty to speed for being unable to see.  Darkness and poor visibility in general reduces your speed to 3/4 normal, instead of 1/2.

Name: Brew Potion

Misc: Can brew potions

Short Text: Create magic potions
Long Text: You can create a potion of any 3rd level or lower spell that you know and that targets one or more creatures.  Brewing a potion takes 1 day.  When you create a potion, you set the caster level, which must be sufficient to cast the spell in question and no higher than your own level.

Name: Cleave

Misc: 1 extra attack once a round if you kill a creature

Short Text: Extra melee attack after dropping target
Long Text: If you deal a creature enough damage to make it drop, you get an immediate, extra melee attack against another creature within reach.  You can not take a 5-foot step before making this extra attack.  The extra attack is with the same weapon and at the same bonus as the attack that dropped the previous creature.  You can only use this ability once per round.

Name: Combat Casting

Misc: +4 Concentration when casting defensively
+4 Concentration when casting in a Pin
+4 Concentration when casting in a Grapple

Short Text: +4 bonus on Concentration checks for defensive casting
Long Text: You get a +4 on Concentration checks made to cast a spell or use a spell-like ability while on the defensive or while you are grappling or pinned

Name: Combat Expertise

Misc: Can trade attack bonus for AC (Max of base attack bonus)

Short Text: Trade attack bonus for AC (max 5 points)
Long Text: When you use the attack action or the full attack action in melee, you can take a penalty of as much as -5 on your attack roll and add the same number as a dodge bonus to your armor class.  This number may not exceed your base attack bonus.  The changes to attack rolls and armor class last until your next action.

Name: Combat Reflexes

Misc: Can make more than 1 attack of opportunity per round (up to dex modifier)
Can make attacks of opportunity while flat footed

Short Text: Additional attacks of opportunity
Long Text: When foes leave themselves open, you may make an number of additional attacks of opportunity equal to your Dexterity bonus.  You may also make attacks of opportunity while flat-footed.

Name: Craft Magic Arms and Armor

Misc: Can create magic weapons, armors, and shields
Can repair magic weapons, armors, and shields

Short Text: Create magic weapons, armor, and shields
Long Text: You can create any magic weapon, armor, or shield whose prerequisites you meet.  You can also mend a broken magic weapon, suit of armor or shield if it is one that you could make.

Name: Craft Rod

Misc: Can create magic rods

Short Text: Create magic rods
Long Text: You can create any rod whose prerequisites you meet.

Name: Craft Staff

Misc: Can create magic staffs

Short Text: Create magic staffs
Long Text: You can create any staff whose prerequisites you meet.

Name: Craft Wand

Misc: Can create magic wands

Short Text: Create magic wands
Long Text: You can create any wand of any 4th level or lower spell that you know.

Name: Craft Wondrous Item

Misc: Can create wondrous items

Short Text: Create magic wondrous items
Long Text: You can create any wondrous item whose prerequisites you meet.  You can also mend a broken wondrous item if it is one that you could make.

Name: Deceitful
Short Text: +2 bonus on Disguise and Forgery checks
Long Text: You get a +2 bonus on all Disguise checks and Forgery checks.

Name: Deflect Arrows

Misc: Once per round, you may deflect 1 ranged melee attack (non-magical attack) that you know of

Short Text: Deflect 1 ranged attack per round
Long Text: You must have at least 1 hand free to use this feat.  once per round when you would normally be hit with a ranged weapon, you may deflect it so that you take no damage from it.  You must be aware of the attack and not flat footed.  Attempting to deflect a ranged weapon doesn't count as an action.  Unusually massive ranged weapons or range attacks generated by spell effects can't be deflected.

Name: Deft Hands
Short Text: +2 bonus on all Sleight of Hand and Use Rope checks
Long Text: You get a +2 bonus on all Sleight of Hand checks and Use Rope checks.
